item.title: Friday Q&A - Swift.Unmanaged
item.description: One of Swift’s great strengths is how well it interoperates with C code. In one of his regular Friday Q&A posts, Mike Ash looks at a key component of this interoperability - Swift’s Unmanaged struct. As Mike shows us, the Unmanaged struct is the API we need when we want to convert Swift object references to and from raw C pointers.
